name: Inner Island
description:
You find yourself on an island, surrounded by a dense mist. You walk around, by solving puzzles to progress from a rock to another. Will you be able to recollect your memories and unveil this island's mysteries ?

  • Classic puzzle gamepleay... or maybe more ?
  • Minimalist dark graphics
  • Atmospheric sound effects

I made this game as an attempt to develop a small idea where the narrative helps the player understanding gameplay elements. Have fun !

I've noticed that the game may fail to load on the itch.io page, but you can then play it here.
